# 7.0 Docs

## Windows Forms

- [APIs throw ArgumentNullException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/7.0/apis-throw-argumentnullexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 7 where some APIs validate arguments and now throw an ArgumentNullException.
- [Obsoletions and warnings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/7.0/obsolete-apis.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change where some Windows Forms APIs have been marked as obsolete or otherwise produce a warning.
